mapper.update: update goods set goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, images = #{images,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock_amount = #{stockAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=DATE}, goods_kind_id = #{goodsKindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select goods_id, goods_type, images, price, stock_amount, create_time, last_update, goods_kind_id, admin_id from goods where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select goods_id, goods_type, images, price, stock_amount, create_time, last_update, goods_kind_id, admin_id from goods
select goods_id, goods_type, images, price, stock_amount, create_time, last_update, goods_kind_id, admin_id from goods WHERE goods_kind_id = #{goodsKindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
